content.question: Which of the following statements relating to supply is true?

choices.label: An increase in an input price will lead to an increase in supply.
An increase in the price of a good will lead to an increase in the supply of the good.
A decrease in consumersâ€™ income will lead to a decrease in the supply of the good.
A decrease in the price of a good will lead to a decrease in the quantity supplied of the good.
A decrease in the price of a substitute good in production will lead to a decrease in the supply of another substitute good.

content.answer: A decrease in the price of a good will lead to a decrease in the quantity supplied of the good.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe economic concepts, principles, or models.
